title: [Sherlock] Design the Composable Manual Build System
description: Design the file structure and the Python script ('scripts/build_manual.py') responsible for compiling the individual manual chapters into a single file for AI consumption during a 'total recall'.

acceptance_criteria.text: Define the final directory structure for the composable manual.
Produce a Python script that reads a master index file and concatenates chapter files into a single '.compiled' output file.
Specify the exact command the Governor will use to trigger this build script.
